item.title: [BIC] A brain-inspired computational model for spatio-temporal information processing
item.description: Abstract Current method: Explicit feature extraction, which requires lots of labeled data. Novel brain-inspired computational model: Reservoir Decision-making Network (RDMN) A reservoir model: projects complex spatio-temporal patterns into spatially separated neural representations via its recurrent dynamics. (regarded it as SVM) A decision-making model: reads out neural representations via integrating information over time. Tasks: Looming pattern discrimination Gait recognition Event-based gait recognition The model Overview Summary: A spatio-temporal pattern is first processed by the reservoir module and then read out by the decision-making module.
